## Overview



## Properties

| Property   | Attribute   | Description                                                                                                                                                                                                                                    | Type                                                                                  | Default     |
|------------|-------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|-------------|
| `color`    | `color`     | The color to use from your application's color palette.<br>Default options are: `"primary"`, `"secondary"`, `"accent"`, `"info"`, `"success"`, `"warning"`, `"error"`.<br>For more information on colors, see [theming](/docs/theming/basics). | `"accent" \| "error" \| "info" \| "primary" \| "secondary" \| "success" \| "warning"` | `undefined` |
| `multiple` | `multiple`  | If `true`, the select accepts multiple values                                                                                                                                                                                                  | `boolean`                                                                             | `undefined` |
| `options`  | `undefined` | An array of options for the popover                                                                                                                                                                                                            | `SelectPopoverOption[]`                                                               | `[]`        |
| `required` | `required`  | If `true`, allow empty on radio options                                                                                                                                                                                                        | `boolean`                                                                             | `undefined` |
| `size`     | `size`      | Change size of the component<br>Options are: `"xs"`, `"sm"`, `"md"`, `"lg"`.                                                                                                                                                                   | `"lg" \| "md" \| "sm" \| "xs"`                                                        | `undefined` |
